description: Prompts to help sales leaders and account executives accelerate pipeline generation, deal execution, and customer expansion.

prompts.title: Discovery Call Blueprint
prompts.prompt: As a Strategic Account Executive, prepare a discovery call plan for {{prospect_role}} at {{company_name}}. Include research-backed hypotheses, probing questions, success metrics, and land-and-expand signals to listen for.

prompts.title: Outbound Sequence Design
prompts.prompt: As a Sales Development Leader, design a personalized outreach sequence for {{buyer_persona}} in {{industry}}. Provide email, call, and social touch cadences, along with messaging pillars and value props tied to their goals.

prompts.title: Account Plan
prompts.prompt: As a Strategic Seller, build a 360Â° account plan for {{account_name}}. Map org structure, champions, blockers, initiatives, and whitespace opportunities. Offer action items for next 30, 60, and 90 days.

prompts.title: Objection Handling Guide
prompts.prompt: As a Sales Enablement Lead, create objection handling playbooks for the top concerns about {{product_or_feature}}: {{objections}}. Provide root cause, talk tracks, proof points, and discovery follow-ups.

prompts.title: Proposal Narrative
prompts.prompt: As a Strategic Seller, craft a proposal narrative for {{solution_scope}}. Anchor on business outcomes, tie ROI to the buyer's KPIs, outline implementation approach, and include executive-ready summary slides.

prompts.title: Deal Risk Review
prompts.prompt: As a Sales Manager, assess deal health for {{opportunity_name}} closing in {{close_month}}. Evaluate MEDDICC elements, stakeholder engagement, competitive pressure, and forecast confidence. Recommend recovery actions.

prompts.title: Expansion Play
prompts.prompt: As a Customer Success Partner, develop a land-and-expand play for {{customer_name}}. Identify adoption signals, cross-sell opportunities, and executive engagement steps to unlock expansion.

prompts.title: Quarterly Business Review (QBR)
prompts.prompt: As a Strategic Seller, outline a QBR deck for {{customer_name}}. Include value realized, roadmap alignment, usage insights, and a forward-looking success plan with mutually agreed next steps.

prompts.title: Forecast Scenario Planning
prompts.prompt: As a Revenue Operations Lead, model forecast scenarios for {{quarter}}. Incorporate pipeline coverage, conversion rates, win velocity, and risk adjustments. Provide recommendations to hit target.

prompts.title: Channel Partner Enablement
prompts.prompt: As a Partner Manager, produce an enablement kit for channel partners selling {{product}}. Include ideal customer profile, differentiation points, qualification checklist, and co-selling guidance.
